UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The Analogs of Temporin-GHa Exhibit a Broader Spectrum of Antimicrobial Activity and a Stronger Antibiofilm Potential Against Staphylococcus aureus.
Literature.Author: Xie Z, Wei H, Meng J, Cheng T, Song Y, Wang M, Zhang Y

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=15 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=40 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=1.6µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MBC=1.6µM),Streptococcus mutans ATCC 25175(MIC=6.2µM),Streptococcus mutans ATCC 25175(MBC=6.2µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=25µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MBC=50µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=6.2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MBC=6.2µM),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC=6.2µM),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MBC=12.5µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=12.5µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=12.5µM),Escherichia coli D31(MIC=50µM),Escherichia coli D31(MBC=50µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MBC=>100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15442(MIC=50µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15442(MBC=>100µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=50µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MFC=>100µM)
